DOC.brief_summary: A study compare MK0893 metformin placebo patient Type 2 diabetes ( Diabetes Mellitus ) .
DOC.criteria: Patients Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus , suboptimal glucose control , either AHA ( antihyperglycemic agent ) therapy monotherapy lowdose combination therapy Patients history Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus Patients take insulin thiazolidinedione ( TZD , peroxisome proliferatoractivated receptor [ PPAR ] gamma agonist ) Patients contraindication metformin
